item.description:
Are you suffering from nature-deficit disorder? Would you like to slow
down, observe the world around you, and feel a connection to the natural landscape that surrounds you? Come along on a silent walk through the woods to experience nature in a new way â€“ through thoughtful prose and reflection.

Co-sponsored by the Friends of Myles Standish State Forest and the Department of Conservation and Recreation.

Meet at Headquarters parking lot at 194 Cranberry Road in South Carver.
Best for adults. Dress for the weather. Rain will cancel.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Finding InspirationThrough Nature
